short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension provides the features for converting your voice to text in Chatter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This App Converts Your Voice to Text for Chatter Posts/Comments.
1. Goto any Chatter Comment/Posts Editor.
2.Press Shift +S. 
3.Click on Speak Now button and start Speaking to convert your voice into Chatter Messages.
